Models¶

A collection of few-shot models.

Prototypical Networks¶

class tensorflow_fewshot.models.PrototypicalNetwork(encoder='ImageNetCNN')¶

Implements Prototypical Networks from the original paper (Snell et al., 2017).

compile_model(n_episode, optimizer)¶

Compile the model.

Build the optimizer and the learning schedule according to the number of episodes, then compiles the model.

meta_train(meta_train_X, meta_train_Y, meta_val_X=None, meta_val_Y=None, n_episode=8000, n_way=60, ks_shots=5, kq_shots=5, optimizer='Adam', logging_interval=200)¶

Trains the model on the meta-training set.

predict(X)¶

Make predictions and return the inferred labels.

train(train_X, train_Y)¶

Train the model.
